00026    RadiusGyration::RadiusGyration(System& system) 
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00028       isInitialized_(false)
00029    {}
00030 
00032    void RadiusGyration::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00033    {
00034 
00035       readInterval(in);
00036       readOutputFileName(in);
00037       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00038 
00039       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00040       accumulator_.clear();
00041 
00042       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00043       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00044          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00045       }
00046 
00047       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00048       if (speciesId_ < 0) {
00049          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00050       }
00051 
00052       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) {
00053          UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00054       }
00055 
00056       speciesPtr_ = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00057       nAtom_ = speciesPtr_->nAtom();
00058 
00059       // Allocate an array of separation Vectors
00060       positions_.allocate(nAtom_); 
00061 
00062       isInitialized_ = true;
00063    }
00064 
00065    /*
00066    * Clear accumulator.
00067    */
00068    void RadiusGyration::setup() 
00069    {
00070       if (!isInitialized_) {
00071          UTIL_THROW("Object is not initialized");
00072       }  
00073       accumulator_.clear(); 
00074    }
00075  
00077    void RadiusGyration::sample(long iStep) 
00078    { 
00079       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00080 
00081          Molecule* moleculePtr;
00082          Vector    r1, r2, dR, Rcm;
00083          double    dRSq;
00084          int       i, j, nMolecule;
00085 
00086          dRSq = 0.0;
00087          nMolecule = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00088          for (i = 0; i < system().nMolecule(speciesId_); i++) {
00089             moleculePtr = &system().molecule(speciesId_, i);
00090 
00091             // Construct map of molecule with no periodic boundary conditions
00092             positions_[0] = moleculePtr->atom(0).position();
00093             Rcm = positions_[0];
00094             for (j = 1 ; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00095                r1 = moleculePtr->atom(j-1).position();
00096                r2 = moleculePtr->atom(j).position();
00097                system().boundary().distanceSq(r1, r2, dR);
00098                positions_[j]  = positions_[j-1];
00099                positions_[j] += dR;
00100                Rcm += positions_[j];
00101             }
00102             Rcm /= double(nAtom_);
00103 
00104             for (j = 0 ; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00105                dR.subtract(positions_[j], Rcm);
00106                dRSq += dR.square();
00107             }
00108      
00109          }
00110          dRSq /= double(nMolecule);
00111          dRSq /= double(nAtom_);
00112       
00113          accumulator_.sample(dRSq, outputFile_);
00114 
00115       } 
00116 
00117    }
00118 
00119    /*
00120    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00121    */
00122    void RadiusGyration::output() 
00123    { 
00124       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00125       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00126          outputFile_.close();
00127       }
00128 
00129       // Write parameters to file
00130       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00131       ParamComposite::writeParam(outputFile_); 
00132       outputFile_.close();
00133 
00134       // Write average to file
00135       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00136       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00137       outputFile_.close();
00138    }

00143    void RadiusGyration::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00144    { ar & *this; }

00149    void RadiusGyration::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
